title: The Great Hope of Easter
itunes:title: The Great Hope of Easter
description: Easter Sunday represents God's great yes to humanity. Throughout history, humanity has turned its back on God, but the Lord has constantly sent rescue operations to bring us back into community with him. The resurrection of Christ is the definitive rescue operation and is our great hope for salvation.
content:encoded: Easter Sunday represents God's great yes to humanity. The resurrection of Christ is the definitive rescue operation and is our great hope for salvation.
